channel.title: Need auto-dropper
channel.description: i need an auto dropper that will drop everything in my inventory except the first item, i know this isn't hard to make, but i'm stupid when it comes to scripting scar, so somone give me an auto dropper

item.title: Need auto-dropper
item.dc:creator: @Cherry_65 Cherry_65
item.description:
@Cherry_65 wrote:

Tryed using SRL???
Use SRL Drop…Example:

[code]Program Drop;

Begin
DropTo(2,28);
End.[/code]

very easy lol check vars…i dont nkow if u have to use them…i dont think so…

Read full topic
